scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir=dist --target=node --external '@ai-sdk/anthropic' --external '@ai-sdk/cerebras' --external '@ai-sdk/cohere' --external '@ai-sdk/deepseek' --external '@ai-sdk/google' --external '@ai-sdk/groq' --external '@ai-sdk/mistral' --external '@ai-sdk/openai' --external '@ai-sdk/perplexity' --external '@ai-sdk/provider' --external '@ai-sdk/replicate' --external '@ai-sdk/togetherai' --external '@ai-sdk/vercel' --external '@ai-sdk/xai' --external '@iarna/toml' --external 'ai' --external 'react' --external 'ink' --external 'ink-spinner' --external 'simple-git' && bun build src/message.ts --outdir=dist --target=node --external '@ai-sdk/anthropic' --external '@ai-sdk/cerebras' --external '@ai-sdk/cohere' --external '@ai-sdk/deepseek' --external '@ai-sdk/google' --external '@ai-sdk/groq' --external '@ai-sdk/mistral' --external '@ai-sdk/openai' --external '@ai-sdk/perplexity' --external '@ai-sdk/provider' --external '@ai-sdk/replicate' --external '@ai-sdk/togetherai' --external '@ai-sdk/vercel' --external '@ai-sdk/xai' --external '@iarna/toml' --external 'ai' --external 'react' --external 'ink' --external 'ink-spinner' --external 'simple-git' && bun build src/providers.ts --outdir=dist --target=node --external '@ai-sdk/anthropic' --external '@ai-sdk/cerebras' --external '@ai-sdk/cohere' --external '@ai-sdk/deepseek' --external '@ai-sdk/google' --external '@ai-sdk/groq' --external '@ai-sdk/mistral' --external '@ai-sdk/openai' --external '@ai-sdk/perplexity' --external '@ai-sdk/provider' --external '@ai-sdk/replicate' --external '@ai-sdk/togetherai' --external '@ai-sdk/vercel' --external '@ai-sdk/xai' --external '@iarna/toml' --external 'ai' --external 'react' --external 'ink' --external 'ink-spinner' --external 'simple-git' && bun build src/config.ts --outdir=dist --target=node --external '@iarna/toml' && bun build src/cli.tsx --outdir=dist --target=node --external 'react' --external 'ink' --external 'ink-spinner' && bun build src/app.tsx --outdir=dist --target=node --external 'react' --external 'ink' --external 'ink-spinner' --external 'simple-git'
scripts.test:integration: RUN_INTEGRATION_TESTS=true bun test --test-name-pattern 'integration test with real API key'
